feature1.explanation: Both texts contain similar punctuation styles with the use of commas and periods.

feature2.explanation: Both texts display consistent lexical and grammatical features with formal language use.

feature3.explanation: Sentence structures in both texts are straightforward and coherent.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were found in either text.

overall.explanation: Based on the analysis of the five features, the texts exhibit consistent writing styles and are likely written by the same author.
